All the authors critically revised the manuscript for important intellectual content. emily.ho@oregonstate.edu 8 2025 45 1 497744 171 195 12 09 2025 29 09 2025 30 09 2025 30 09 2025 Breast cancer is a heterogeneous disease with varying subtypes, prognoses, and treatment responses. Cruciferous vegetables have shown promise in reducing breast cancer risk.
